des:
Awair Glow tracks toxins and chemicals in your air and provides you with personalized recommendations to help you stay safe and healthy. Glow plugs directly into your wall and controls your "non-smart" devices for you--and now with Alexa you can have effortless, hands-free control of these devices. 

You can customize Glow to turn on a device for a variety of different reasons, such as when it senses a change in your air quality, by motion detection, during certain times of day–and now with just a few words.

Use Glow and Alexa to easily and creatively improve your air quality to stay healthy:
"Alexa, turn on the nursery heater."
"Alexa, turn off the living room fan."
"Alexa, turn on the bedroom diffuser."
"Alexa, turn off the office lamp."

To get started, simply plug your device into Glow in the ON position to enable Alexa. Once you’re connected, you can easily set up and manage your device through the Awair app.
